name: Sized Bite
description:
Scale yourself at will

What will you do with your earned power?
Will you solve the mystery of the shrunken castles?
Will you collect all the golden teeth?

Everything will make itself clear at the right size

Its a chill exploration game with a little big scale mechanic and some platforming where you can also opt-in to collect teeth. There is no ending at the microcscopic scale but you may mind find some smaller things.

  • Grow with Left Mouse
  • Shrink with Right Mouse
  • Move with WASD and Mouse
  • Jump with Space
  • Switch Windowed with Alt+Enter
  • Exit with Alt+F4
  • Reset To Start Position with R

Fixed some collision bugs and fixed the scaling minimum issue so you can now go through that tiniest keyhole.

Made for the Ludum Dare game jam
